alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson County through 545 AM CDT... At 514 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mahaska, or 13 miles southwest of Fairbury, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairbury and Endicott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
